description: Detects creation of a hidden user account on macOS (UserID < 500) or with IsHidden option Author: Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Hidden User Creation
query: (process.executable:*\/dscl AND process.command_line:*create* AND ((process.command_line:*UniqueID* AND process.command_line:/([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|[1-4][0-9]{2})/) OR (process.command_line:*IsHidden* AND process.command_line:(*true* OR *yes* OR *1*))))
